Line23.8CA44: You've grown fearful in your old age, my friend! But worry not, I will stay put.
Line25.6D03F: A relic from the days of old Kehjistan maybe. Lost to time until Elias seized it.
Line27.8CA44: It must hold some treasure, eh?
Line3.8CA44: Look at this! To think such an intriguing place was hidden beyond the storm.
Line7.6D03F: Meshif. Don’t move. Don’t speak to anyone. There is great danger lurking here.
VoiceDir25.6D03F: Musing on what this could be--not excited like Meshif. More suspicious and cautious.
VoiceDir3.8CA44: Intrigued by this hidden gem in the desert
